Post-Match Reflections: I hope these New York fans find [their] way to the exit real quickâ€¦ Take y'all ass home.
Trae Young has shown why he's one of the more exciting players in the league, trolling the Knicks just a week after the Yankees choked the World Series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Zaccharie Risacher poured in 33 points and grabbed seven boards in a statement performance.
Trae Young rekindles his personal rivalry with the Knicks since they first met in the playoffs in 2021.
The Hawks are a team in transition, having traded Dejounte Murray to the Pelicans after realizing that pairing him with Trae Young was a mistake.
The Hawks drafted a shooting big in an effort to surround Young with size, athleticism, defense, and shooting.
They've acquired Larry Nance Jr. to provide an athletic lob threat, in case the Hawks plan to trade Clint Capela for younger assets.
